info.title: Quidkey API

address_line1.description: The first line of the address

address_line2.description: The second line of the address

apartment.description: The apartment, unit, or suite number

client_id.description: The client ID of the partner or merchant

client_secret.description: The client secret of the partner or merchant

access_token.description: The access token to be used for authenticated requests

refresh_token.description: The refresh token to be used to obtain a new access token

expires_in.description: The number of seconds until the access token expires

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

access_token.description: The access token to be used for authenticated requests

refresh_token.description: The refresh token to be used to obtain a new access token

expires_in.description: The number of seconds until the access token expires

id.description: The unique identifier of the merchant

brand_name.description: The brand name of the merchant

uri.description: The URI of the merchant's website

activation_status.description: The activation status of the merchant

multi_account_setting.description: The multi-account setting of the merchant

client_id.description: The client ID of the merchant

account_owners.description: The account owners associated with this merchant

items.title: Merchant Account Owner
items.description: Information about a merchant account owner

id.description: The unique identifier of the account owner

full_name.description: The full name of the account owner

email.description: The email address of the account owner

phone_number.description: The phone number in format: country_code;number (e.g., 44;7395236209)

role.description: The role of the account owner within the organization

is_primary.description: Whether this account owner is the primary contact

created_at.description: The timestamp when the account owner was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the account owner was last updated

brand_name.description: The brand name of the merchant

uri.description: The URI of the merchant's website

uri.description: The updated URI of the merchant's website

activation_status.description: The new activation status for the merchant

mode.description: The new mode for the merchant

merchantBankAccount_PaymentSchemeInfo.title: Payment Scheme Info
merchantBankAccount_PaymentSchemeInfo.description: Payment scheme information for merchant bank account responses

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment scheme

name.description: Human-readable name of the payment scheme

is_active.description: Whether this account actively receives payments for this scheme

additional_payment_method.description: Whether this scheme appears as a separate payment option in UI

id.description: The unique identifier of the bank account

account_number.description: The account number or IBAN of the bank account

currency.description: The currency of the bank account

country.description: The country of the bank account

status.description: The status of the bank account

created_at.description: The creation date of the bank account

updated_at.description: The last update date of the bank account

iban.description: The IBAN of the bank account (for EU market)

bic.description: The BIC of the bank account (for EU market)

sort_code.description: The sort code of the bank account (for UK market)

routing_number.description: The routing number of the bank account (for US market)

bban.description: Basic Bank Account Number (e.g., for Norway)

items.title: Payment Scheme Info
items.description: Payment scheme information for merchant bank account responses

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment scheme

name.description: Human-readable name of the payment scheme

is_active.description: Whether this account actively receives payments for this scheme

additional_payment_method.description: Whether this scheme appears as a separate payment option in UI

country.description: The country of the bank account

bic.description: The BIC of the bank account (for EU market)

sort_code.description: The sort code of the bank account (for UK market)

routing_number.description: The routing number of the bank account (for US market)

bank_id.description: The optional unique identifier of the associated bank entity

bban.description: Basic Bank Account Number (e.g., for Norway)

supported_payment_schemes.description: Optional array of payment schemes with active status. If omitted, no payment schemes will be attached.

is_active.description: Whether this account should actively receive payments for this scheme. Defaults to false if not specified.
